verses.verse: I will love <S%H7355><s%> you <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, my strength <S%H2391><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is my rock <S%H5553><s%>, and my fortress <S%H4686><s%>, and my deliverer <S%H6403><s%>; my God <S%H410><s%>, my strength <S%H6697><s%>, in whom I will trust <S%H2620><s%>; my shield <S%H4043><s%>, and the horn <S%H7161><s%> of my salvation <S%H3468><s%>, and my high tower <S%H4869><s%>.
I will call <S%H7121><s%> upon the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, who is worthy to be praised <S%H1984><s%>: so shall I be saved <S%H3467><s%> from my enemies <S%H341><s%>.
The sorrows <S%H2256><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%> surrounded <S%H661><s%> me <S%H5158><s%>, and the floods of ungodly men <S%H1100><s%> made me afraid <S%H1204><s%>.
The sorrows <S%H2256><s%> of hell <S%H7585><s%> surrounded me about <S%H5437><s%>: the snares <S%H4170><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%> prevented me <S%H6923><s%>.

In my distress <S%H6862><s%> I called <S%H7121><s%> upon the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and cried <S%H7768><s%> unto my God <S%H430><s%>: he heard <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%> out of his temple <S%H1964><s%>, and my cry <S%H7775><s%> came <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H241><s%>, even into his ears.

Then the earth <S%H776><s%> shook <S%H1607><s%> and trembled <S%H7493><s%>; the foundations <S%H4146><s%> also of the hills <S%H2022><s%> moved <S%H7264><s%> and were shaken <S%H1607><s%>, because he was angry <S%H2734><s%>.

There went up <S%H5927><s%> a smoke <S%H6227><s%> out of his nostrils <S%H639><s%>, and fire <S%H784><s%> out of his mouth <S%H6310><s%> devoured <S%H398><s%>: coals <S%H1513><s%> were kindled by it <S%H1197><s%>.
He bowed <S%H5186><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> also <S%H3381><s%>, and came down: and darkness <S%H6205><s%> was under his feet <S%H7272><s%>.
And he rode <S%H7392><s%> upon a cherub <S%H3742><s%>, and did fly <S%H5774><s%>: Yes <S%H1675><s%>, he did fly upon the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the wind <S%H7307><s%>.

He made <S%H7896><s%> darkness <S%H2822><s%> his secret place <S%H5643><s%>; his pavilion <S%H5521><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> him were dark <S%H2824><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> and thick clouds <S%H5645><s%> of the skies <S%H7834><s%>.
At the brightness <S%H5051><s%> that was before him his thick clouds <S%H5645><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%>, hail <S%H1259><s%> stones and coals <S%H1513><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> also thundered <S%H7481><s%> in the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and the Highest <S%H5945><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>; hail <S%H1259><s%> stones and coals <S%H1513><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%>.
Yes <S%H7971><s%>, he sent out his arrows <S%H2671><s%>, and scattered <S%H6327><s%> them <S%H7232><s%>; and he shot out lightnings <S%H1300><s%>, and defeated them <S%H2000><s%>.

Then the channels <S%H650><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> were seen <S%H7200><s%>, and the foundations <S%H4146><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> were discovered <S%H1540><s%> at your rebuke <S%H1606><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, at the blast <S%H5397><s%> of the breath <S%H7307><s%> of your nostrils <S%H639><s%>.
He sent <S%H7971><s%> from above <S%H4791><s%>, he took <S%H3947><s%> me <S%H4871><s%>, he drew me out of many <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>.
He delivered <S%H5337><s%> me from my strong <S%H5794><s%> enemy <S%H341><s%>, and from them which hated <S%H8130><s%> me <S%H553><s%>: for they were too strong for me.
They prevented <S%H6923><s%> me in the day <S%H3117><s%> of my calamity <S%H343><s%>: but the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was my stay <S%H4937><s%>.
He brought me forth <S%H3318><s%> also into a large place <S%H4800><s%>; he delivered <S%H2502><s%> me <S%H2654><s%>, because he delighted in me.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> rewarded <S%H1580><s%> me according to my righteousness <S%H6664><s%>; according to the cleanness <S%H1252><s%> of my hands <S%H3027><s%> has he recompensed me <S%H7725><s%>.
For I have kept <S%H8104><s%> the ways <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and have not wickedly departed <S%H7561><s%> from my God <S%H430><s%>.
For all his judgments <S%H4941><s%> were before me <S%H5493><s%>, and I did not put away his statutes from me <S%H2708><s%>.
I was also upright <S%H8549><s%> before him <S%H8104><s%>, and I kept myself from my iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.

Therefore has the Lord <S%H3068><s%> recompensed <S%H7725><s%> me according to my righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, according to the cleanness <S%H1252><s%> of my hands <S%H3027><s%> in his eyesight <S%H5869><s%>.
With the merciful <S%H2623><s%> you will show yourself merciful <S%H2616><s%>; with a upright <S%H8549><s%> man <S%H1399><s%> you will show yourself upright <S%H8552><s%>;
With the pure <S%H1305><s%> you will show yourself pure <S%H1305><s%>; and with the perverse <S%H6141><s%> you will show yourself perverse <S%H6617><s%>.
For you will save <S%H3467><s%> the afflicted <S%H6041><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>; but will bring down <S%H8213><s%> high <S%H7311><s%> looks <S%H5869><s%>.
For you will light <S%H215><s%> my candle <S%H5216><s%>: the Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%> will enlighten <S%H5050><s%> my darkness <S%H2822><s%>.
For by you I have run through <S%H7323><s%> a troop <S%H1416><s%>; and by my God <S%H430><s%> have I leaped over <S%H1801><s%> a wall <S%H7791><s%>.

As for God <S%H410><s%>, his way <S%H1870><s%> is perfect <S%H8549><s%>: the word <S%H565><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is tried <S%H6884><s%>: he is a shield <S%H4043><s%> to all those that trust in him <S%H2620><s%>.
For who is God <S%H433><s%> save <S%H1107><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>? or who is a rock <S%H6697><s%> save <S%H2108><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>?
It is God <S%H410><s%> that puts <S%H247><s%> me with strength <S%H2428><s%>, and makes <S%H5414><s%> my way <S%H1870><s%> perfect <S%H8549><s%>.
He makes <S%H7737><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> like hinds <S%H355><s%>' feet <S%H5975><s%>, and sets me upon my high places <S%H1116><s%>.
He teaches <S%H3925><s%> my hands <S%H3027><s%> to war <S%H4421><s%>, so that a bow <S%H7198><s%> of steel <S%H5154><s%> is broken <S%H5181><s%> by my arms <S%H2220><s%>.

You have also given <S%H5414><s%> me the shield <S%H4043><s%> of your salvation <S%H3468><s%>: and your right hand <S%H3225><s%> has held me up <S%H5582><s%>, and your gentleness <S%H6037><s%> has made me great <S%H7235><s%>.
You have enlarged <S%H7337><s%> my steps <S%H6806><s%> under me <S%H7166><s%>, that my feet did not slip <S%H4571><s%>.
I have pursued <S%H7291><s%> my enemies <S%H341><s%>, and overtaken <S%H5381><s%> them <S%H7725><s%>: neither did I turn again until they were consumed <S%H3615><s%>.
I have wounded <S%H4272><s%> them that they were not able <S%H3201><s%> to rise <S%H6965><s%>: they are fallen <S%H5307><s%> under my feet <S%H7272><s%>.
For you have girded <S%H247><s%> me with strength <S%H2428><s%> unto the battle <S%H4421><s%>: you have subdued <S%H3766><s%> under me those that rose up against me <S%H6965><s%>.
You have also given <S%H5414><s%> me the necks <S%H6203><s%> of my enemies <S%H341><s%>; that I might destroy <S%H6789><s%> them that hate me <S%H8130><s%>.
They cried <S%H7768><s%>, but there was none to save <S%H3467><s%> them <S%H3068><s%>: even unto the Lord, but he answered them not <S%H6030><s%>.

Then did I beat <S%H7833><s%> them small as the dust <S%H6083><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the wind <S%H7307><s%>: I did cast them out <S%H7324><s%> as the dirt <S%H2916><s%> in the streets <S%H2351><s%>.

You have delivered <S%H6403><s%> me from the strivings <S%H7379><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>; and you have made <S%H7760><s%> me the head <S%H7218><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%>: a people <S%H5971><s%> whom I have not known <S%H3045><s%> shall serve me <S%H5647><s%>.
As soon as they hear <S%H8088><s%> of me <S%H8085><s%>, they shall obey me <S%H1121><s%>: the strangers shall submit themselves unto me <S%H3584><s%>.
The strangers <S%H1121><s%> shall fade away <S%H5034><s%>, and be afraid <S%H2727><s%> out of their close places <S%H4526><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> lives <S%H2416><s%>; and blessed <S%H1288><s%> be my rock <S%H6697><s%>; and let the God <S%H430><s%> of my salvation <S%H3468><s%> be exalted <S%H7311><s%>.
It is God <S%H410><s%> that avenges <S%H5414><s%> me <S%H1696><s%>, and subdues the people under me <S%H5971><s%>.

He delivers <S%H6403><s%> me from my enemies <S%H341><s%>: Yes <S%H7311><s%>, you lift me up above those that rise up <S%H6965><s%> against me <S%H5337><s%>: you have delivered me from the violent <S%H2555><s%> man <S%H376><s%>.
Therefore will I give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto you <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and sing praises <S%H2167><s%> unto your name <S%H8034><s%>.

Great <S%H1431><s%> deliverance <S%H3444><s%> gives he to his king <S%H4428><s%>; and shows <S%H6213><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%> to his anointed <S%H4899><s%>, to David <S%H1732><s%>, and to his seed <S%H2233><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> evermore <S%H5769><s%>.
